messages.content: I would like a large pepperoni pizza with extra cheese.
{"response": "Got it! I've added a large pepperoni pizza with extra cheese to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["pepperoni", "extra cheese"], "quantity": 1}}
Can I get a small veggie pizza with extra olives?
{"response": "Sure! A small veggie pizza with extra olives is added to your order.", "order": {"size": "small", "toppings": ["vegetables", "olives"], "quantity": 1}}
I'd like two medium pepperoni pizzas.
{"response": "Two medium pepperoni pizzas have been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "toppings": ["pepperoni"], "quantity": 2}}
One large Hawaiian pizza, please.
{"response": "Got it! I've added one large Hawaiian pizza (ham and pineapple) to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["ham", "pineapple"], "quantity": 1}}
I'd like a medium pizza with extra cheese and mushrooms.
{"response": "A medium pizza with extra cheese and mushrooms has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "toppings": ["cheese", "mushrooms"], "quantity": 1}}
Can I get a small cheese pizza with no toppings?
{"response": "A small cheese pizza with no toppings has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "small", "toppings": ["cheese"], "quantity": 1}}
Please make it a large pizza with half pepperoni and half mushrooms.

{"response": "A large pizza with half pepperoni and half mushrooms has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": {"half1": ["pepperoni"], "half2": ["mushrooms"]}, "quantity": 1}}
I want two large meat lover's pizzas.

{"response": "Two large meat lover's pizzas (with pepperoni, sausage, and bacon) have been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["pepperoni", "sausage", "bacon"], "quantity": 2}}
One gluten-free pizza with spinach and tomatoes.
{"response": "One gluten-free pizza with spinach and tomatoes has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "crust": "gluten-free", "toppings": ["spinach", "tomatoes"], "quantity": 1}}
Can I get a large pizza with sausage and mushrooms?
{"response": "A large pizza with sausage and mushrooms has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["sausage", "mushrooms"], "quantity": 1}}
I'd like three small pizzas: one cheese, one veggie, and one pepperoni.

{"response": "Three small pizzas have been added to your order: one cheese, one veggie, and one pepperoni.", "order": {"size": "small", "quantity": 3, "orders": [{"toppings": ["cheese"]}, {"toppings": ["vegetables"]}, {"toppings": ["pepperoni"]}]} }
Two medium half cheese, half pepperoni.

{"response": "Two medium pizzas, half cheese and half pepperoni each, have been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "quantity": 2, "orders": [{"toppings": {"half1": ["cheese"], "half2": ["pepperoni"]}}}]} }
One large pizza with everything on it.

{"response": "One large pizza with everything has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["pepperoni", "sausage", "bacon", "mushrooms", "green peppers", "onions", "olives", "pineapple"], "quantity": 1}}
I want a medium pizza with olives and green peppers.
{"response": "A medium pizza with olives and green peppers has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "toppings": ["olives", "green peppers"], "quantity": 1}}
One large pizza with ham and pineapple.
{"response": "One large Hawaiian pizza with ham and pineapple has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["ham", "pineapple"], "quantity": 1}}
Three small pizzas with pepperoni and extra cheese.
{"response": "Three small pizzas with pepperoni and extra cheese have been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "small", "toppings": ["pepperoni", "extra cheese"], "quantity": 3}}
Can I get one medium pizza with just cheese and no sauce?
{"response": "One medium cheese pizza with no sauce has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "toppings": ["cheese"], "quantity": 1, "no_sauce": true}}
One regular crust pizza with mushrooms and olives.
{"response": "One regular crust pizza with mushrooms and olives has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "medium", "crust": "regular", "toppings": ["mushrooms", "olives"], "quantity": 1}}
One large pizza with sausage and bacon, no onions.
{"response": "A large pizza with sausage and bacon, no onions, has been added to your order.", "order": {"size": "large", "toppings": ["sausage", "bacon"], "no_toppings": ["onions"], "quantity": 1}}
